sections.title: Advanced Engineering Economics and Finance → Economía e ingeniería financiera avanzada

listening.audio: How does net present value help in engineering investment decisions?
options: It compares the present value of future cash flows to initial investment costs
It eliminates all financial risks
It only considers immediate costs

listening.audio: What advantages does real options valuation offer?
options: It values the flexibility to make future decisions as conditions change
It eliminates all uncertainty
It only works for financial instruments

listening.audio: Why is life cycle cost analysis important for engineering projects?
options: It considers all costs from acquisition through disposal, not just initial investment
It only looks at purchase price
It eliminates all maintenance costs

sections.title: Advanced Materials Characterization → Caracterización avanzada de materiales

items.english: Scanning electron microscopy reveals material microstructure at high magnification
items.spanish: La microscopía electrónica de barrido revela microestructura de materiales a alta magnificación

items.english: X-ray diffraction identifies crystalline phases and structural properties
items.spanish: La difracción de rayos X identifica fases cristalinas y propiedades estructurales

items.english: Mechanical testing determines strength, stiffness, and failure characteristics
items.spanish: Las pruebas mecánicas determinan resistencia, rigidez y características de falla

items.english: Thermal analysis measures temperature-dependent material behavior
items.spanish: El análisis térmico mide comportamiento de materiales dependiente de temperatura

items.english: Fatigue testing evaluates material performance under cyclic loading

items.english: Surface analysis characterizes interface properties and modifications
items.spanish: El análisis de superficie caracteriza propiedades de interfaces y modificaciones

items.english: Nanoindentation measures mechanical properties at small scales
items.spanish: La nanoindentación mide propiedades mecánicas a escalas pequeñas

items.english: Corrosion testing assesses material degradation in service environments
items.spanish: Las pruebas de corrosión evalúan degradación de materiales en ambientes de servicio

items.english: Non-destructive evaluation detects flaws without damaging specimens
items.spanish: La evaluación no destructiva detecta fallas sin dañar especímenes

listening.audio: How does scanning electron microscopy benefit materials engineering?
options: It provides detailed images of material structure at very high magnifications
It only works with metals
It destroys all samples during examination

listening.audio: What information does X-ray diffraction provide about materials?
options: It reveals crystal structure, phase composition, and lattice parameters
It only measures thickness
It changes material properties permanently

listening.audio: Why is fatigue testing important for engineering materials?
options: It predicts how materials will perform under repeated loading conditions
It only tests materials once
It eliminates all material failures
